title: Three Amulet Stories  Evergreen Review
author: Roberta Allen
response:
Emotions: Amusement, Hopeful, Romantic
Summary: Artem, a young boy, steals an amulet from the Wise Woman of Isan. He believes that the amulet will make the islanders like him. While walking along the beach, he finds a suitcase full of gemstones. He takes the gemstones back to the village and shows them to the islanders. They are excited and believe that Artem is not so bad after all. They follow him to the shore to find the suitcase, but it is gone. The islanders are angry and call Artem names. Artem is ashamed and heads back to the village.
